mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review ( product_id, member_id, payment_id, order_item_id, rating, content, image_url, likes, is_visible, is_private, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{productId}, #{memberId}, #{paymentId}, #{orderItemId}, #{rating}, #{content}, #{imageUrl}, #{likes}, #{isVisible}, #{isPrivate}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM review WHERE product_id = #{productId} AND is_visible = TRUE ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET rating = #{rating}, content = #{content}, image_url = #{imageUrl}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND member_id = #{memberId}
